<h3 id="X38229">X(38229) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(5), X(13), X(14)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b^2+c^2)*a^6-4*(b^4-b^2*c^2+c^4)*a^4+(b^2+c^2)*(6*b^4-11*b^2*c^2+6*c^4)*a^2-(3*b^4-5*b^2*c^2+3*c^4)*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38229) = 5*X(2)+X(12355) = 5*X(5)-2*X(114) = X(5)+2*X(115) = 11*X(5)-2*X(14981) = 5*X(5)-8*X(15092) = 3*X(5)-2*X(36519) = X(114)+5*X(115) = 11*X(114)-5*X(14981) = X(114)-4*X(15092) = X(114)-5*X(23514) = 3*X(114)-5*X(36519) = 11*X(115)+X(14981) = 5*X(115)+4*X(15092) = 3*X(115)+X(36519) = 4*X(2023)-X(32448) = X(14981)-11*X(23514) = 3*X(14981)-11*X(36519) = 4*X(15092)-5*X(23514) = 12*X(15092)-5*X(36519) = 3*X(23514)-X(36519)</b>
<p>X(38229) lies on these lines: {2,12355}, {5,39}, {13,20253}, {14,20252}, {30,9166}, {98,546}, {99,3628}, {140,6321}, {147,3851}, {148,1656}, {381,9755}, {542,38071}, {543,15699}, {547,671}, {548,10723}, {549,5461}, {550,6036}, {632,6722}, {952,38220}, {1483,11725}, {2784,38140}, {2794,3845}, {2796,38083}, {3023,10593}, {3027,10592}, {3090,13188}, {3091,12188}, {3526,13172}, {3564,6034}, {3627,12042}, {3843,9862}, {3850,6033}, {3855,5984}, {3858,11623}, {3861,10722}, {5066,11632}, {5067,20094}, {5469,16267}, {5470,16268}, {5901,13178}, {6054,11737}, {6055,15687}, {7516,13175}, {8591,15703}, {8703,9880}, {8724,10109}, {9478,22712}, {9830,38079}, {9956,11599}, {10113,33511}, {10264,15359}, {10280,13187}, {10796,18424}, {11539,14971}, {11646,18583}, {11801,18332}, {11812,12117}, {12243,19709}, {12812,23235}, {13182,15325}, {13925,19109}, {13993,19108}, {14830,14893}, {16278,20304}, {32515,33228}</p>
<p>
X(38229) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {115, 23514}, {381, 14651}, {671, 15561}, {6321, 21166}, {14639, 38224}<br>
X(38229) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5, 23514), (549, 34127), (11539, 14971), (15561, 547), (21166, 140), (34127, 5461)<br>
X(38229) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (114, 15092, 5), (6036, 22515, 550), (6321, 14061, 140), (6722, 33813, 632), (9166, 14639, 38224)<br>
</p>
